text: @Mike_Pence What “sanctity of life”? You & your boss are causing the deaths of tens of thousands of Americans due to your completely incompetent & knowing mismanagement of the response to the coronavirus pandemic.  You are committing involuntary manslaughter, & should be prosecuted.  SHAME!
